import React from 'react' import TopTable from './statsComponents/TopTable' import TrackTable from './statsComponents/TrackTable' import LoadedFalse from './statsComponents/LoadedFalse' import SpotifyLogin from './statsComponents/SpotifyLogin' import PlaylistInfo from './statsComponents/PlaylistInfo' import { getTopArtists, getTopAlbums } from '../utils/dataManipulation' import '../styles/Stats.css' const Stats = (props) => { // Page with no playlist loaded yet if (props.loaded === false){ return } else{ // Error -> Need Authentication if (props.error){ return } const topArtists = getTopArtists(props.data) const topAlbums = getTopAlbums(props.data) return (

Top Artists

Most Popular Track

Longest Track

Shortest Track

  • Track Name: {props.data['shortest_track']['Track Name']}
  • Track Artists: {props.data['shortest_track']['Track Artists']}
  • Album Name: {props.data['shortest_track']['Album Name']}
  • Track Popularity: {props.data['shortest_track']['Track Popularity']}
  • Track Duration: {props.data['shortest_track']['Track Duration']}
) } } export default Stats
